content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

************************************************************************************************************

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result] '

    ************************************************************************************************************


    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) with (store_and_fwd_flag char(1) ,
    VendorID int,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7)) 

    AS [result]
